overview: As Vice President of New Business Development, Brendan Brown leverages his unique business perspective to cultivate creative sales, marketing and product development strategies in order to communicate the Vann Group’s value proposition for small/mid-size businesses and drive growth for all of The Vann Group companies. Before settling into Western Massachusetts to raise his young family, Brendan traveled the world as a recording artist, selling over 100,000 records and was directly responsible for coordinating business, financial and tour management efforts, developing online and direct to consumer marketing strategies and overseeing the groupâ€™s digital and physical content distribution and merchandising efforts. More recently, Brendan co-founded SpinTunnel (a new media marketing firm) which has secured clients such as Warner Brothers and Sony to write, implement and manage interactive online marketing campaigns. This experience, paired with a notable Business to Business sales career, makes Brendan a valuable addition to The Vann Group.
